Title: Taxi Driver
Overview: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feed his urge for violent action.
Tagline: On every street in every city, there's a nobody who dreams of being a somebody.
Keywords: vietnam veteran, taxi, obsession, drug dealer, night shift, vigilante, alienation, misanthrope, shot to death, illegal prostitution, loner
production_companies: Columbia Pictures Corporation, Italo/Judeo Productions, Bill/Phillips
Cast: Robert De Niro, Cybill Shepherd, Harvey Keitel
